thread.title: 32 Pieces Of Decor That'll Make Your Home Look So Much Bigger
thread.title_full: 32 Pieces Of Decor That'll Make Your Home Look So Much Bigger

author: Elizabeth Lilly
title: 32 Pieces Of Decor That'll Make Your Home Look So Much Bigger
text:
View this image ›
Ellie Sunakawa / BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page.
ID: 10281227 1. Stack up a unique nightstand with these rose gold-accented foot lockers to wrangle extra bed linens and other random bedroom stuff. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $84.99+ . / Also available in blush pink and cream.
ID: 10275682 2. Avoid extra clutter by choosing decor with open lines, like this blank-space picture frame . View this image ›
hm.com Get it from H&M for $17.99. / Also available in gold-tone.
ID: 10265680 3. Disguise your lack of room for an actual kitchen counter peninsula or island with this high-top table and stool set as an easy stand-in. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $133.99 .
ID: 10268223 4. And feel like you’re flooded with gratuitous countertop space with this granite-top kitchen cart that’ll scoot wherever you want it. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $64.05 .
ID: 10267308 5. Make your ceilings look taller by hanging long curtains above the window frame. These tassel-trim curtains come in several colors and lengths, and will let you have the perfect balance of privacy and light. View this image ›
serenaandlily.com Get them from Serena & Lily for $29.99+ each. / Available in four sizes, eight color combos.
ID: 10260830 6. Or, forgo (inches of) space-hogging curtains and add a second layer to your windows with cool, privacy enhancing window film . amazon.com Get at 23.6”x78.7” roll from Amazon for $17.89 .
ID: 10266742 7. Get a little inventive with a striped rug that incorporates ~layers~ of patterns for a deceptively widening floor covering. View this image ›
hm.com Get a 55”x79” rug from H&M for $79.99 .
ID: 10266681 8. Sick to death of room-elongating stripes? Opt for a light-hued area rug that’ll have a similar effect as light-bouncing mirrors. View this image ›
amazon.com And place (at least two of) the room’s furniture’s feet on the rug to make it look like it fits the room perfectly.
Get a 4’x6’ rug from Amazon for $60.48 . / Available in five sizes.
ID: 10265918 9. That also goes for light-colored runners that’ll brighten up any dim, narrow hallway or galley kitchen. amazon.com Get a 2’x13’ runner from Amazon for $59 . / Available in six sizes, 11 colors.
ID: 10265956 10. Amplify any and all light sources with a compact mirrored table to make a room look brighter and bigger. Chrome furniture gives off the same effect. Get them from Target for $84.99 and $89.99 . target.com , target.com Chrome furniture gives off the same effect.
Get them from Target for $84.99 and $89.99 .
ID: 10265292 11. Squeeze in linen closet-like storage beside your bathroom sink with this sturdy little ladder bookshelf that’ll hold towels and even a humidity friendly houseplant. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $33.25 .
ID: 10275380 12. Invest in a fiddleleaf fig tree as an easy care houseplant that (like magic!) makes any room feel bigger. Don’t ask us how, but it does. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $32.99 .
ID: 10265821 13. Commit to a mid-century modern look with a pin-leg coffee table that won’t break your line of sight in a small living space. View this image ›
wayfair.com Get it from Wayfair for $67 . / Also available in espresso.
ID: 10266983 14. Bump out the visual space of an accent wall with a horizontal-leaning pattern made with a string light . View this image ›
urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $10 . / Available in three colors.
ID: 10260899 15. Obscure a utility closet or create the illusion of a Mariah Carey size bedroom closet by hanging a ~tasteful~ bamboo beaded curtain in a doorway. View this image ›
amazon.com Get the 125-strand panel from Amazon for $59.19 .
ID: 10271998 16. Play tricks on your eyes with a ghost chair knockoff that won’t block the visual flow of the room. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it on Amazon for $72.28 . / Available in eight colors.
ID: 10267077 17. If you can’t live without color, continue the mid-century modern schtick with a pair of Eames-style chairs that’ll maintain the flow. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $99.99 . / Available in 10 colors.
ID: 10267088 18. Bounce around light in a teensy kitchen like nobody’s business with a stainless-steel kit that’ll transform appliances. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $24.95 .
ID: 10266934 19. Deny your inner slob another enclosed kitchen cabinet and hang up an open shelf for easier access to tools, spices, and cooking essentials you use on the reg. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $37.99 .
ID: 10267173 20. Trick the eye into thinking you have cathedral ceilings with a pretty, vertical wall hanging . View this image ›
target.com Get it from Target for $29.99 .
ID: 10265624 21. Shield your eyes from the glint of trash — yes, trash — with a sleek waste bin . Get it from Amazon for $15 . / Available in three colors. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $15 . / Available in three colors.
ID: 10267114 22. Compensate for the lack of an office with this compact storage desk that’ll be your new WFH central. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $100.50 . / Also available in black, brown.
ID: 10275336 23. Stick on a wall-decal headboard to make it look like you have room for an actual headboard. View this image ›
etsy.com Get it from SirFace Graphics on Etsy for $27.80+ . / Available in four sizes, 30 colors.
ID: 10260963 24. Style a tall table vignette with cool objects, like this marble obelisk , because when you can’t go wide, you go up! View this image ›
tjmaxx.tjx.com Get it from T. J. Maxx for $19.99 .
ID: 10272167 25. Opt for a hide-the-ugly-stuff piece that provides extra seating with this stylish storage bench that’ll look great in your living room or at the foot of your bed. View this image ›
allmodern.com Get it from AllModern for $151.99 . / Also available in gray.
ID: 10275502 26. Outfit an entryway for smart storage — without halting foot traffic — with a sleek floating cabinet . View this image ›
westelm.com Get it from West Elm for $249 .
ID: 10268033 27. Play the same trick with a floating media center to create the illusion of more floor space and a little extra storage space underneath during desperate times. View this image ›
wayfair.com Get it from Wayfair for $153.36 .
ID: 10268152 28. Create a moment for pause with a big piece of art that fills up some serious space, like this pretty framed agate canvas . View this image ›
tjmaxx.tjx.com Get it from T. J. Maxx for $39.99 .
ID: 10272179 29. Do as people have for centuries and make the most of natural light by placing mirrors on a wall adjacent to natural light for the effect of a bigger room with more windows. View this image ›
allmodern.com Be glad you don’t have to rely on mirrors to help provide reading (candle)light.
Get them from AllModern for $17.55 .
ID: 10260833 30. Use the good ole stars and stripes (specifically the stripes) of this flag shower curtain to widen the look of a narrow bathroom. View this image ›
urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $39 .
ID: 10260950 31. Stash reading materials in an opportune spot and score some major design-cred points with this modern acrylic table . View this image ›
wayfair.com Get it from Wayfair for $296.99 .
ID: 10260827 32. And always remember that floating shelves — even tiny ones — are your BFF because the more wall space you can eye, the bigger your place’ll look. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $20 .
ID: 10272228 Want even more great product suggestions? Sign up for BuzzFeed’s Gift Guide Newsletter!
View this embed ›
ID: 10291446 If you can’t see the signup box above, just go here to sign up for the BuzzFeed Gift Guide newsletter! ID: 10291450 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
